name: Amira Rahman
bio: Amira focuses on low-light houseplants and sustainable watering techniques for urban apartments.

name: Takeshi Mori
bio: With over 15 years of experience in bonsai cultivation, Takeshi blends Japanese tradition with modern aesthetics.

name: Farid Ahmed
bio: Farid designs lush, low-maintenance gardens and focuses on soil health and companion planting.
